name: Air Controll
description:
I made this game for Low Stakes High rolling 2 jam. After completley throwing away my initial idea for the game i created this in the little bit of time I still had left. Air Controll is a game set in a world slowly falling apart. There are 2 levels to explore and a hidden one. There are little things hidden in all corners. 

Movement:

WASD - move

SPACE - jump

TAB - teleport forawrd
